stimulusHtml: Which of the following was a historical context for the development depicted in the image?

features.html:
Photograph of Harriet E. Vittum reading to children at the Northwestern University settlement house in Chicago, Illinois, 1914

DN-0062525, Chicago Daily News Collection, Chicago History Museum

choicesHtml: The resettlement of Mormons escaping religious persecution
The arrival of new immigrants in the United States
The migration of farmers fleeing dust storms
The forced relocation of people suspected of disloyalty during wartime
